Token.Abstract: The UHNBGMControllerDelegate protocol defines the methods that a delegate of a UHNBGMController object must adopt. The optional methods of the protocol allow the delegate to monitor, request, or command the Glucose sensor. The required methods of the protocol indicates discovery, connectivity, and reporting current glucose measurements with the Glucose sensor.
Notifies the delegate when a Glucose sensor has been discovered

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController which with the Glucose sensor was discovered

Parameter.Name: bgmDeviceName
Parameter.Abstract: The device name of the Glucose sensor

Parameter.Name: serviceUUIDs
Parameter.Abstract: An array of NSString representing the UUID of the services available for the Glucose sensor. This array includes all the provided required services and potentially additional services.

Parameter.Name: RSSI
Parameter.Abstract: The rssi power of the Glucose Sensor

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate when a Glucose sensor did connect

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController that is managing the Glucose sensor

Parameter.Name: bgmDeviceName
Parameter.Abstract: The device name of the Glucose sensor

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate when a Glucose sensor was disconnected

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController that was managing the Glucose sensor

Parameter.Name: bgmDeviceName
Parameter.Abstract: The device name of the peripheral

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the requested get number of stored records has been completed successfully

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController which with the RACP procedure was executed

Parameter.Name: numberOfRecords
Parameter.Abstract: The number of stored records

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate when a Glucose sensor has a measurement to report

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController that is managing the Glucose sensor

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the record received

Parameter.Name: measurementDetails
Parameter.Abstract: A NSDictionary including all the measurement details

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate when a Glucose sensor has a measurement context to report

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController that is managing the Glucose sensor

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the record received

Parameter.Name: measurementContextDetails
Parameter.Abstract: A NSDictionary including all the measurement context details

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the requested get of stored records has been completed successfully

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController which with the RACP procedure was executed

Parameter.Name: numberOfRecords
Parameter.Abstract: The number of records transferred

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate when the Glucose sensor features characteristic has been read

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController which with the characteristic was read

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate when the Glucose Measurement characteristic notification has been enabled or disabled

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController which with the characteristic was configured

Parameter.Name: enabled
Parameter.Abstract: If YES indicates that the notification was enabled. NO indicates that the notification was disabled

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate when the Glucose Measurement Context characteristic notification has been enabled or disabled

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController which with the characteristic was configured

Parameter.Name: enabled
Parameter.Abstract: If YES indicates that the notification was enabled. NO indicates that the notification was disabled

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate when all the characteristic notifications have been enabled or disabled

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: The UHNBGMController which with the characteristics were configured

Parameter.Name: enabled
Parameter.Abstract: If YES indicates that all the notification were enabled. NO indicates that the notifications were disabled
